entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Charlevoix
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:59 AM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -9.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Charlevoix 06:00 AM EST Friday 10 February 2023
Temperature: -9.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.3 kPa falling
Humidity: 90 %
Wind Chill: -16
Dewpoint: -11.2°C
Wind: NE 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 12 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h this evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 10 February 2023
